Nahum__02.2__Hath rendered the pride of Jacob: : He hath punished Jacob for his pride; and therefore Ninive must not expect to escape. Or else, rendering the pride of Jacob means rewarding, that is, punishing Ninive for the pride they exercised against Jacob.
Nahum__02.3__Of his mighty men: : He speaks of the Chaldeans and Medes sent to destroy Ninive.-- Ibid.
Nahum__02.3__Stupefied: : consopiti. That is, they drive on furiously like men intoxicated with wine.
